title: Linda Nolan unveiled her new face for the first time on Loose Women
text:
Linda Nolan unveiled her new face for the first time on Loose Women The Nolans singer showed her sister Coleen Nolan the results of her £6,000 facelift Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Linda Nolan showed off the results of her £6,000 facelift for the first time to her sister Coleen - and she was so impressed she wants the surgeon's number. 
One person who hadn’t seen Linda’s facelift until now was Coleen, 51, who was crowned the winner of Celebrity Big Brother earlier this month. 
And Coleen, from Wilmslow, was stunned by her sister's makeover as she unveiled it live on the ITV1 chat show Loose Women , saying "You look fabulous." 
The Nolans singer Linda, 57, claims she is now looking younger than Coleen after having surgery at London’s Harley Street Skin Clinic. 
Linda was worried about the reaction from her sister, who is anti-surgery, saying: "I had butterflies hoping Coleen would like it, knowing how she feels about surgery." 
But Coleen, who was blindfolded as her sister walked out to take a seat next to her on the Loose Women panel, gave her new look the thumbs-up. Linda showed off her new look on Loose Women (Photo: ITV) 
Talking about the surgeon behind the transformation she said: "You'll have to give me his number." 
Linda, 57, previously admitted she had considered suicide because she looked tired and haunted after 10 years of mourning her late husband Brian. Linda Nolan before the surgery (Photo: Urban PR) 
And she beat breast cancer only for it to take her sister Bernie in 2013. Read More 
After undergoing the surgery, Linda says she feels like a new woman. She chose a lower facelift and extreme skin peel on the advice of her surgeon. (Photo: ITV) 
But, speaking about having the procedure while Coleen was in the CBB house, Linda said previously “Coleen will kill me for it!” Read More
